column5: Been to Gouin reservior for many years. Looking for a change of scenery. Looking mainly for some good pike action with some walleye's for dinner! Basic outpost accommodations are good enough. No meal plan or caretaker required, but remote isolation is. Driving from New Jersey, USA so would like to keep the trip to about 12 hours or so. thanks in advance for any suggestions. Kevin
Try Monet Outfitters caught alot of Pike while not fishing for them. They used to have a guide named Pike.http://monetadventure.ca/Fishing.htm
